body: If I remember correctly, `WriteShort()` takes a (signed) `int16_t`, so the maximum value is `0x7fff`. Maybe use `std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::max` to avoid errors here?
body_html: If I remember correctly, WriteShort() takes a (signed) int16_t, so the maximum value is 0x7fff. Maybe use std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::max to avoid errors here?
body_text: If I remember correctly, WriteShort() takes a (signed) int16_t, so the maximum value is 0x7fff. Maybe use std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::max to avoid errors here?
